titleStmt.title: The exemplification of the Queenes Maiesties letters pattents directed for the reliefe of Gregory Pormorte, marchant of the towne of Kingstone vpon Hull, to her Maiesties louing subiects within this realme, for one year
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Whitgift, John, 1530?-1604.
Aylmer, John, 1521-1594.
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1583-1604 : Whitgift)
Church of England. Diocese of London. Bishop (1577-1594 : Aylmer)

notesStmt.note: Form letter, with blanks for names of bishops.
Elizabeth's proclamation, with cover letters of the archbishop of Canterbury (dated June 27), and the bishop of London (dated June 30).
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
